articles.title: Week ahead: AMZN, GOOG, PLTR, AMD, PFE, DIS, PYPL, ABBV, QCOM, SMCI, MRK, PEP, UBER, PM - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Week of Feb 2–6 earnings calendar: Big Tech, semis, healthcare, energy & more.
articles.content: Earnings season rolls into a high-impact week ahead, with results due from a broad cross-section of the market spanning Big Tech, semiconductors, healthcare, energy, consumer, REITs, and financials.… [+65 chars]
